name: Sense of Accomplishment
description:
Sense of Accomplishment is game made for #NotAGameJam
https://itch.io/jam/not-a-game-jam-game-jam

Your goal is to gather resources while moving through the world as the environment around you changes.

If you can't afford to pay for the game you can download the source blend file and play it within blender. You'll need UPBGE 0.2.4 to make it work.
